website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality option if you are looking for a traditional teeter-totter for older and younger children.
pros: Includes a shock absorber at the bottom of the seat
Made with steel for sturdy feel and durability
Easy-access handlebars are a snap to grip
Frame holds up after heavy use
cons: Seats are not the best quality, and can break and crack if kept outdoors in the weather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to assemble, just need a ratchet wrench... if you don’t have one, just an adjustable wrench is fine. I think it only took me 20 mins to put together and can be done by one person. Seems VERY sturdy. And the kids love it! Doesn’t take too much space. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality seats
customer_reviews.text: Teeter Totter frame is quality built and appears sturdy. Really easy for this 78 year old grandma to put together. Seats are really, really terribly built. Won't last through summer. Bought 2 cans flex seal to spray them. When I called customer service to voice concern, I was told I could make a shower cap to put over them so they obviously are aware of the issue. What a shame. Nice frame, not so nice seat.
customer_reviews.author: Eilyne

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun on backyard teeter totter
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toy. Sturdy, stable, comfortable for young and older children. Use with good supervision, of course, but loads of smiles and giggles will be yours with this teeter totter. Not a difficult assembly. Parts are clearly marked and grouped in plastic on cardboard with clear illustrations. My grandchildren are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: KathyBoBathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, both my girlfriend and I tottered together on this so the weight limit is genuine, and I'd guess that it would support heavier. I do agree that the seat fabric is less than ideal, with the seat pad and fabric cover both holding water. I immediately upholstered clear vinyl over the seats during the assembly process prior to being bolted on. Disregarding the few pieces of grass that got under my vinyl, this made the seats more durable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy
customer_reviews.text: Coolest yard toy ever! I was about to purchase this toy on another site for way more money and decided to check here first so I could get it sooner and to my surprise it was here for way less. It was super easy to put together and it's amazing quality. The seat is extra big and cushioned so smaller and less coordinated kids can ride it safely. It's designed to stay floating so if one kid jumps off it doesn't send the other crashing like it did when I was a kid. So impressed with this toy and was the best $85 ever spent. Our kids love it
customer_reviews.author: ashh2205

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Since we are all "safer at home", we must give the children something to do. I ordered a couple of these, since there are quite a few grandchildren. This is strong enough to hold even the older kids.......but they are small in stature. Still, it held two (small-ish) teenage girls without a problem. Of course, the younger kids really are having fun. This teeter totter is a little big for the toddler crowd, but in our world the bigger kids joined the little kids so all could ride.
customer_reviews.author: Adult Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sturdy and I can see the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value, sturdy and I can see the kids getting years of play out of this product. I bought a dome several years ago from this same company and it still looks brand new even now. Quality product, highly recommend for parents who don't want to have to keep replacing cheaper yard toys for their kids. This stuff will last.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin NC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE product. I personally NEVER leave reviews, but I felt it was necessary to inform potential buyers of how long this product lasted. -It was fairly easy to assemble according to my husband, and the sturdiness was great! HOWEVER; it lasted all of 16 months before BOTH seats fell apart (literally disintegrated and broke off.) It is now a lawn ornament until my husband purchases “bike seats” and rigs it himself to fix it. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ww

customer_reviews.title: This would be a 5 star product but...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. Finally trashed the first one when the seat supports rotted and I could not reach the company to order more. Very frustrating. I hope this one will last for 3-4 years and the kids will have outgrown it by then or the company finds someone to answer their phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Washington

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my family child care and the kids enjoy it. I've had it for 9 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family child care and the kids enjoy it. I've had it for 9 months and kept it outside. so far its help up to the sunny CA weather and 5 days of rain and it hasn't faded. The seat cushions seam to be holding up too. I have kids ages 2-5 and they need supervision using it. When one child is on it, it requires an adult to hold down the other side so the child can get on. I've read the new model allows you to adjust it so children of different weight can enjoy without tipping the other one over.
customer_reviews.author: K___

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my porch and I absolutely love it! It is so thick and strong it doesn’t move. It truly will hold 300 pounds. I love the handles because they dip down so there is no chance of hitting your face. The seats are big and comfortable and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: angelique brue

customer_reviews.title: We love it but it is BIG
customer_reviews.text: Company should amend the recommended ages to at least 5/6 years old. My tall 4 amd 5 year old look kinda small on this. It makes momma’s heart pound for a few days imagining a broken arm. But, several days later and a lot of practice, my kids are having a blast. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Brunet

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old daughters birthday. She was so excited! Easy to put together and looks great. I bought some trampoline stakes to make it more sturdy in the ground. She goes on it everyday. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: A C S

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids who love to be outside and active, then you need one of these Seesaws, We had to pry my 2 year old Grandson's hands off the grips to get him to come inside... And I love that it is so Colorful. Excellent Gift and was very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Polly215

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of seats wrong dated for when it’s made
customer_reviews.text: When I got this product seats were already stained, can’t see much because I wiped it off in this pic date on dear says 8/6/2019 it’s so last YEAR it’s NOW 05/24/2020 so not sure if this was returned from someone, staples look so messy for paying 120. For this item just hope it’s works okay
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: THIS ONE IS THERE FAVORITE. IT HAS THE ANTI-IMPACT PIECE ON THE UNDER ...
customer_reviews.text: OUT OF THE 2 TEETER-TOTTERS I GOT FOR MY GRAND KIDS, THIS ONE IS THERE FAVORITE. IT HAS THE ANTI-IMPACT PIECE ON THE UNDER SIDE SO IT HELPS WITH THE OTHER CHILD GETTING OFF SUDDENLY. HAS BEEN HOLDING UP VERY WELL.
customer_reviews.author: gosjohn316

customer_reviews.title: Teeter
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren enjoy this teeter-totter very much. The only issue was the that the brown truck delivered the package to the house across the street as my grandson and myself were watching from the garage. That upset the boy quite a bit but we retrieved the package quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Staal

customer_reviews.title: Great fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My boys have LOVED this! They got it to share for their birthday. It gives a great new addition to outside toys. They are 2 and 4. I have to help the 2 year old get on but won't be long and they will have it figured out. Went with this one because it seemed like better quality than some of the others. Some complained about the seat cushions but they actually send you seat covers now. We haven't experienced whether they weather or not yet but I did put the covers on them!
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Buy now! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Just got it and my kids are obsessed (twin 7 year olds and a 2 year old). Easy to put together, love the price, and I feel strongly that it will hold up under their craziness ;) get it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. It’s large enough even for adults! I was on it with my son! Love it. It’s pretty fun! Beautiful colors! Took about 15 mins to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This Gym Dandy replaced an old Gym Dandy see saw. Easy to put together and not overly heavy. The kids at my church love it. Reasonably priced also.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Tea

customer_reviews.title: Damaged !
customer_reviews.text: Damaged ! Bended ! See picture ... couldn’t assemble it... have to return it. Wasted my time assembling until I found out about the bended part and had to disassemble to put it back in the box !
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: holding up great despite months of rain!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! We’ve had for maybe 6 months now and the seats are holding up great despite a super rainy winter. We’ve kept it out in the elements with no issues. The seats dry quickly and are still intact and brightly colored.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Good but could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: So this guy is easy to build and very sturdy BUT... After a month in the So Cal summer sun, the seat cover is falling apart and the handlebar grips are sticky to the touch. After using, the kids have black sticky rubber On the palms of their hands. It’s like the grips are slowly melting. Otherwise it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R.

customer_reviews.title: Seesaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughters 12 th bday. Hasn't used yet. Dad says easy to put together. But dad is good at those things.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hanson-Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fect for small backyard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small backyard and two girls! (6 and 2) The two year old went on with my supervision and did not want to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. The seat are covered with a fabric material; I don't know how well that will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We got this and it was missing a seat.. was disappointed but called Amazon and they got the replacement out to us.. now very happy with the product and son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids in the backyard.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids. They love it. It is very well made and real sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and sturdier than expected - Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size the toddlers can grow into for years to come. Very sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey62

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Takes up a fair amount of room but excellent quality. Grandkids liked it.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it, but cloth seats for an outdoor play item? I recovered the seats in heavy plastic before assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Monica P.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy. Padded the handlebars with pipe insulation to prevent teeth getting knocked out.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherCreature

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This teeter totter came recommended by a friend. I was not let down when it arrived. This was super simple to put together, about 20 min with me and my husband. My nieces and nephews love it! The only thing to consider is that if the kids on each seat aren't similar in weight, they will need help getting it to swing.
customer_reviews.author: NEWBY

customer_reviews.title: ... several years ago and the seats were made much better andlasted years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this several years ago and the seats were made much better andlasted years. The seats now will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I made a mistake!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong one. I wanted the one that spins around as well as up and down
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Teeter Totter is All Fun Exercise
customer_reviews.text: The teeter totter was super easy to assemble (at some point another person is helpful). My daughters are so pleased with it. As soon as they come home its straight to the see saw. My husband and I get on it with our daughters and it is wonderful exercise. Packaging was great, delivery was prompt. Amazon is on point!
customer_reviews.author: PatsyVeronica

customer_reviews.title: Actually my Granddaughter and her boyfriend put it together yesterday and is very pleased to see that it it very well built
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our Grandson. Actually my Granddaughter and her boyfriend put it together yesterday and is very pleased to see that it it very well built. So happy with it and my Grandson just LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, seems very durable. previously people complained about the durability of seats when exposed to outside weather. well the company now ships them with water proof seat covers for the cushion seats. now the product is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: KHAN

customer_reviews.title: I like this teeter totter
customer_reviews.text: I like this teeter totter, It was easy to put together and did not take very long. I gave 3 stars because the seats are made of CLOTH, for a outdoor toy I think that cloth seats are going to wear down quickly and would have preferred hard plastic like previous models.
customer_reviews.author: RadMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great seesaw
customer_reviews.text: Great seesaw my kids 4 and 7 loved it nice and sturdy very worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Sam A

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun product. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My grandchildren have a blast on it. I also join them and enjoy it plenty. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love it! One 4 yr old and one 6 yr old. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. The seat is large, the fabric covering is iffy as to durability we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ( Other then the horrible fabric the durability of the teeter totter itself seems ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband just put this together for my sons birthday and we are literally on day 3 and the seat has already ripped :( Other then the horrible fabric the durability of the teeter totter itself seems really sturdy and that it will last. Really disappointed in the craftsmanship of the seats though.
customer_reviews.author: HillaryR

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: clients love playing on it. We use it indoors but it's super sturdy and would last out doors too
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaLife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, getting a great deal of pleasure watching the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, getting a great deal of pleasure watching the grandkids. Customer service was awesome, unit came without seat covers when not in use, wife called they came in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: FMR

customer_reviews.title: ID tag is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The kids like the products and it is built well other than the seat support is still loose after tightening. The big issue is the name plate riveted to the seat support, it is flat mounted to a round bar and sharp as a razor blade. While tightening the seat bolts i cut the top of my hand on it, a little kid could get a serious cut on this as well. needless to say i removed this immediately !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Vatsend

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our kids (7 and 8)! We hope they will be able to play with it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really meant for outside use
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to put together but have to wait until spring to use it. It’s huge!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Big enough for adults to use! Seems very sturdy, I guarantee it will last for years. The only thing I’m worried about is the material on the seats, Hope it withstands the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Beemer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. very good design however
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. very good design however, i am concerned about the seat as it is made of wood and will have a problem with wet weather. would be improved if the seats were metal or of a material which would not weather in the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, durable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super sturdy teeter tauter and my Grandkids absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. kaz

customer_reviews.title: If only all the pieces to assemble were included in the box, it'd be great!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this teeter totter for our grandson's birthday. When putting it together, we discovered 2 pieces missing, two pieces that hold the seats on! We contacted the customer service number in the manual and find that the parts are out of stock. It will be 2 weeks or more until we get the missing pieces.......after our grandson's birthday and party. Delivery was quick. Teeter-totter looks like it will be great fun and last a long time. If only we had all the pieces to complete it.....
customer_reviews.author: Sharding745

customer_reviews.title: great product. needs better seat covers
customer_reviews.text: love this except the seat coverings are very cheap. ours is indoors. I am afraid once I put it outside the seats will be history
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well put together!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and durability. I highly recommend this as an addition to your child's play yard!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy! Kids love these. We have one we ordered about five years ago. Other than replacing the seat (which is inexpensive and easy) we have had no problems with either one that we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last like it should have
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for the grandson a year ago but now one year later looks like needs to trash it. The seat coverings all came apart and should have lasted much longer than this. It is outside under a covered deck. Just not the quality that I thought it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Dries pretty quickly after it rains though
customer_reviews.text: On the smaller side. My boys are 4 and 5 years old. They'll be able to use this for awhile... Well made except for the seats. They are padded which is a plus. I'm just not sure how long the seats will hold up. Dries pretty quickly after it rains though. I'd give this 5 stars if the seats were plastic
customer_reviews.author: Wilmz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. My grandkids really enjoy it. Super heavy duty. Great quality. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmama

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old Twins LOVE this! We had one years ago and they wore it out. They asked for another so we got it for their birthday. They still love it! We keep it in the house so the weather won't tear it up. This one is slightly shorter than the previous one (same brand), but still solid.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it and the kids love it.....had to replace the seats though after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: SherryH

customer_reviews.title: Can go over 300 pound!!
customer_reviews.text: even my mom and dad play it!! really good my mom 150 my dad 170 nice!!
customer_reviews.author: kim tran

customer_reviews.title: My kids (and I) love it. I can see that the cloth covered ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids (and I) love it. I can see that the cloth covered seats can get weather torn. We keep ours covered with a tarp when not in use. The seats are fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Coocoomunga

customer_reviews.title: Great teeter totter
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this teeter totter and it’s great for older kids to use since it allows more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Barlogio

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 6 months now and my kids, the neighbors kids, big and small love it! It has been outside in heat & rain and we have had no issues with anything tearing up. I have kids from 2-10 on it almost daily. Sometimes 4 at a time. Very worth the price! We would definitely purchase again and I have recommended it to friends!
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Kids play on it weekly. Very strong and sturdy. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kids have went crazy over this and its excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Martin

customer_reviews.title: Seats
customer_reviews.text: The seats didn't hold up wondering if you can buy replacement seats?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy for the weight
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy for the weight. And because of the weight I move it under the patio when not in use so the seat fabric and moisture are not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Melder

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy for inside or out. Light enough to move around. Great for three years and up
customer_reviews.author: Ma Mer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids tend to slide forward onto the yellow bar. It should have foam or something to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The cloth seats threw me for a loop. The kiddos enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: So Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gym Dandy Teeter Totter this Christmas 2013 for my Grandchildren and I'm very pleased with the quality and size of it. They are ages 3,4,5&6 and it's the perfect size not babyish at all which I was afraid it would be. No problem putting it together everything was there. If I must have one negative thing to say I would of liked it to have come with mounting spikes to secure it in the ground. I'm so excited for them to see it when they come over on Christmas morning and to get it out of my Living room :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Dijoseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids just love this! Very sturdy, Great build. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: extremely durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this! Big size and comfy seats. My nephew is 12 and I got on it with him. His little brother is 4 and loves it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it and so do the adults as it's quite sturdy and the padded seats are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loves it and so do the adults as it's quite sturdy and the padded seats are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Strahm

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The teeter totter itself works very well and is sturdy. However, the red on the seats has started to rub off onto my kids cloths. We have been able to get it off when we wash them...so far.
customer_reviews.author: Momto6

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any playset
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and even in our weather extremes of Syracuse, NY, I haven't seen any issues of wear. We had to replace the seat covers only because our sweet little husky decided to make a meal of them but they were easily replaced and didn't take much effort. I'm really happy with the purchase and it didn't take my husband extremely long to put together.
customer_reviews.author: dmreeve

customer_reviews.title: Easier to assemble then I first thought
customer_reviews.text: It went together well. Just one seat won't tighten like the other. Buying another bolt. But Good Quality.

customer_reviews.title: Teeter totter GREAT addition to outside play area!
customer_reviews.text: My grand-children who are 4 and 41/2 have enjoyed it from the moment it was put together. Fairly easy for Mom to put together.

customer_reviews.title: The seats mildew easily and it will rust quickly
customer_reviews.text: The seats mildew easily and it will rust quickly, so I moved mine into the basement. It works great though.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW... better then I thought it was going to be. We do keep it in the garage during winter, but the grand-kids and their parents love it! Very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy it so much I found it on Amazon for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this teeter totter elsewhere for my grandchildren to play on at my house. They enjoy it so much I found it on Amazon for less and bought one for their house.

customer_reviews.title: Playtime
customer_reviews.text: it was so east to put together. Extremely durable. I first saw it at Costco for $79.00 more and could not believe that it was only $99.00 on Amazon. Gotta Love Them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young and old
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and sturdy. Our younger grandchildren were too small, but love riding with mom and dad. The grandkids also got a chuckle watch their dad and grandpa riding together. Great exercise for the leg muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: teeter totter
customer_reviews.text: great product. with stands the harsh weather, and the kids love it. the only thing i dont like is when the seat comes down it leaves a big hole in the ground

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is great fun and very sturdy. My 3 year old grandson loves. It will be even better when he has someone else to play on it with him:)

customer_reviews.title: Teeter Totter
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids love this, I would highly recommend this easy to put tighter Teeter Totter. Very well made product

customer_reviews.title: See saw.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. But was disappointed when I seen a bigger one with merry go around for cheaper price. It pays to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Durable !!
customer_reviews.text: The teeter totter is awesome my kids that are using it are twins 9 boy & girl . We homeschool so I wanted affordable sturdy playground . Our son weighs 100 pounds . I ride it with him and even my oldest son who is 180 pounds rode it with me . You won't be disappointed it does however take a little muscle to put together but I'm 44 and 155 pounds N I figured it out !
customer_reviews.author: Mom26

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love this teeter tooter. Great way to keep them active and out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: CHildren's Home
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these on our playground and they a lot of use! Super sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Young Homes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I tested the strength of this Teeter Totter by getting on one side and my husband on the other (both over 150lbs). Not only did it hold our weight with ease, but is was really fun. The kids, ages 4 and 5 go crazy on it. I do suggest training the kids to get on and off and not to put their legs under it at anytime. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: zeanah

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Looks much bigger in pictures. this is good for 2-6 year old kids. Decent quality, just too small for bigger kids.
customer_reviews.author: rasta pasta

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for my two nephews for Christmas. One will be three in February and the other two in march. They absolutely love the teeter totter! My sister, the boys mom, also really enjoys this toy. I recommend this itnwill give the kids hours of enjoyment, and for the adult a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Cepko

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a little over a month and the seat has already cracked. It has not been used more than a half dozen times by 2 small children, not even heavy and one of the seats is cracking and the paint is chipping off too. It is a mess and I now feel a total waste of my money. I gave my first review as somewhat positive only because it was not good for our 3 year old, seemed dangerous the seat is large, but now I am furious at the short life of this toy and it is beyond the return time so we have no options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 & 5 year old "perfect"
customer_reviews.text: Nice and 'almost' portable... good size as it's not the big set - EASY to put together, well made, sturdy, good buy for the price !!
customer_reviews.author: davmorrill

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the teeter totter! It is now the hit of the neighborhood. It is a great sturdy product. Better than most you see at a playground.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - bought it for my granddaughters and they love it - very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it even with the uneven weight distribution of them ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple following the instructions. My kids love it even with the uneven weight distribution of them (a 30 lb & a 85 lb).
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Y

product_meta.title: Gym Dandy Teeter-Totter Home Seesaw Playground Set TT-210
product_meta.description:
Give your kids endless hours of fun right in the comfort of your home with the Teeter-Totter Home Playset by Gym Dandy! Build a backyard playground for your kids with this colorful seesaw designed especially for home use and suitable for kids ages 3 to 13. Featuring brightly colored poweder coated finish with padded handle grips to prevent hand calluses even after hours of play. This home playground equipment is built from the finest steel and plastic and engineered to support riders totaling up to 300 pounds in weight. This playground set is reinforced with large bump absorbers that significantly reduce impact, making it a lot safer than a park’s standard seesaws. The bump absorbers also make it easier and more comfortable to play, while the large, elongated, and padded seats ensure that your children’s bottoms won’t hurt even after hours of exhilarating play! This kids home playground equipment uses a single fulcrum creating a more traditional seesaw rocking motion. It is easy to install and has the appropriate size for your backyard – 86” long X 34” wide and 33.5” height, weights 38 lbs. Not only does this seesaw aid your children in strenghthening their muscles, but it allows them to intereact with other people. Give your children fun and excitement right in the comfort of your home with the Gym Dandy TT-210 Teeter Totter!

AMAZON.COM


Get out and play with the colorful Gym Dandy teeter-totter. Designed for children between the ages of 3 and 13, the Gym Dandy teeter-totter gives your little ones as much fun at home as they would at the park. The teeter-totter employs a patented pendulum system to create a rocking motion, along with large bumper absorbers that significantly reduce impact. This makes it safer than traditional teeter-totters, so you don't have to worry about your kids getting hurt while in the backyard. The Gym Dandy is also extremely comfortable, with elongated, soft-cushioned seats that are easy on the bottoms. Best of all, the teeter-totter is designed to withstand years of outdoor use thanks to its powder-coated finish. Easy to assemble, the Gym Dandy teeter-totter measures 86” long X 34” wide and 33.5” height, weights 38 lbs, and supports up to 300 pounds.
feature_bullets: COLORFUL DESIGN – Brightly colored powder coated finish with padded grip handles to prevent calluses even after hours of play
BUMP ABSORBER – Reinforced with a bump-absorber mechanism that allows for comfortable play by reducing impacts, making it safer than traditional park seesaws.
COMFORTABLE SEAT PAD – Gym Dandy provides elongated soft cushioned seats for users

"HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS – This playground is made with premium-quality steel and the finest plastic. Large, elongated, and padded seats for a comfortable ride, supporting riders up to 300 lbs. in total weight. "

SAFE & ERGONOMIC DESIGN – This fun and pleasurable play set is designed with a single fulcrum for a more traditional rocking motion. It also features ergonomic handle bars so your children can easily grip the bars without worrying of falling off balance
